name: 2nd International Conference on Future Communication & Computing Technology
content: One of the primary motives of the 2nd International Conference on Future Communication & Computing Technology (ICFCCT-2021) to be held in Mumbai, from 10am to 5pm on 29th - 30th of April 2021 is to spur unique discoveries in terms of countering conventional challenges faced in everyday engineering activities and technologies. Technology is progressing at a very fast pace, which currently is weighing heavily on the earth's bounty of natural resources and causing serious damage to the environment.
organizers: Institute For Engineering Research And Publications (IFERP)
